channel.title: CVE Feed for Mark Senff -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-24418|2024-08-03T19:28:23.840Z -- mark%20senff -- smooth%20scroll%20page%20up%2Fdown%20buttons
item.description: The Smooth Scroll Page Up/Down Buttons WordPress plugin through 1.4 does not properly sanitise and validate its psb_positioning settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to set an XSS payload in it, which will be executed in all pages of the blog
